bibl.title: An Anthology of Byzantine Poetry. (London Studies in Classical Philology. 14.)
bibl.note: Voir pp. 100-105: Dioscorus of Aphrodito, In Praise of Justin II, P. Cairo Masp. II, 67183 recto = Ernst Heistsch, G.D.R.K. I, XLII, fr. 1 (= Pack2 348).
Baldwin Barry, An Anthology of Byzantine Poetry. (London Studies in Classical Philology. 14.)
